name: Game A Week 1: Superposition
description:
Made in one week (+ a day, but who's counting)

Small puzzle game inspired by the projects hosted on https://www.puzzlescript.net/

Specifically the works of Stephen Lavelle.

Z/X (Keyboard), B/X (Gamepad) - Undo/Redo

R (Keyboard), Y (Gamepad) - Restart

Escape (Keyboard), Hold Start (Gamepad) - Close
